data.message:
You know what I would love to see change on Facebook
It's not more stupid and pointless and annoying features. It's their ability to actually read bug reports, and actually fix those bugs, and do so without waiting for months on end only to make it worse and screw up ten more things. 

Just like right now. I suddenly cannot use messenger anymore, at all, after having multiple issues leading up to this. Yet, every single report I've made about it has been completely ignored, and I know this report will go ignored as well.

replies.message: Let's remember together the phase before facebook and laugh !! Waiting for your feedback : https://youtu.be/-Zc5Fu0v0XY

Good for you, Janie Lipsmeyer
I can now that they have fixed it, too. I posted my comment last night, and I wasn't the only one who couldn't.
